channel.title: Deep Learning on Editor - Personal Blog Hugo Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Editor - Personal Blog Hugo Theme

item.title: Waste Analytics System for Greyparrot.ai
item.description: At Greyparrot.ai, I helped build a world-class waste analytics platform. I led the Deep Learning team to create a system that automatically recognizes all trash items going through recycling facilities, helping recover all valuable materials and converting them to assets.

item.title: Talk: Computer Vision for Recycling and Waste Management
item.description: I gave a talk about how we are using Computer Vision to detect and track all waste through recycling facilities for the Women in Data Science group.

item.title: SETI Talk: Planetary Defense: Long Period Comets
item.description: Together with my team, I gave a talk on how we can provide more warning time in case a long-period comet happens to be in a collision trajectory with Earth.

item.title: Searching for Long Period Comets with Deep Learning at NASA and SETI
item.description: In planetary defence (yes! there is such a thing, where scientists and engineers try to defend the planet from hazards), long-period comets are recognized as the potentially most devastating threat.

item.title: Get the Look on our Chatbot with Visual Search
item.description: Leveraging our image and pattern recognition technology, we developed a chatbot that enables users to search product collections using images.

item.title: Talk at ReWork: Deep Learning for Fashion Attributes Search
item.description: I gave a talk on how to use Deep Learning to search and serve relevant products to your web visitors.

item.title: Transforming the in-store shopping experience with AI
item.description: At Macty, we developed a novel in-store experience, where users can upload images of outfits and we suggest lingerie to pair it with.

item.title: Cross-modal Search for Fashion Attributes
item.description: In this paper we develop a neural network which learns inter- modal representations for fashion attributes to be utilized in a cross-modal search tool.

item.title: Latent Dirichlet Allocation for Linking User-Generated Content and e-Commerce Data
item.description: Automatic linking of online content improves navigation possibilities for end users.

item.title: Learning to Bridge Colloquial and Formal Language Applied to Linking and Search of E-Commerce Data
item.description: We study the problem of linking information between different idiomatic usages of the same language, for example, colloquial and formal language.

item.title: Inferring User Interests on Social Media From Text and Images
item.description: We propose to infer user interests on social media where multi-modal data (text, image etc.

item.title: Cross-Modal Fashion Search
item.description: In this paper we show an online demo that allows bidrectional multimodal queries for garments.
